hero.title: Gukiza Ubwenge, Kubaka Icyizere
hero.subtitle: Gutanga ubufasha bw'ubuzima bwo mu mutwe n'ibikoresho bifasha impunzi kongera kubaka ubuzima bwabo muri Afurika

chatbot.title: Ubufasha bw'Ubuzima bwo mu Mutwe
chatbot.welcome: Muraho! Ndi hano kugufasha kubona ibikoresho by'ubuzima bwo mu mutwe n'ubufasha.
chatbot.response: Urakoze kutwegera. Umuhanga mu by'ubuzima bwo mu mutwe azakuvugisha vuba. Ku bufasha bwihuse, hamagara umurongo wacu ukorera amasaha 24: +250 782 485 566
